page.title: 07DAILY POST OFFICE LIFE
page.content: THE POST OFFICE OPENS EVERY MORNING AT 9:00. THE FIRST THING WE DO IS FIX THE DATE STAMP TO THE PROPER DATE. THEN WE HAVE TO BRING ALL STOCKS OUT OF A SECURE PLACE. THE SERVICE TO THE CUSTOMERS USUALLY STARTS WITH LETTERS, STAMPS ETC. AT 1:00-2:00 WE HAVE A BREAK AND ALL STOCK IS AGAIN MOVED. THE MONEY FLOW TAKEN ACROSS IS USUALLY MADE FROM THE PAYMENT OF ELECTRICTY AND TELEPHONE ACCOUNTS AND FOR INVESTMENTS IN VARIOUS SAVINGS. ONE OF THE TIME CONSUMING EFFORTS IN THE POST OFFICE IS THE FILLING OF VARIOUS FORMS PARTICULARY FOR THE ELDERY. AT THE END OF THE DAY ALL TRANSACTIONS HAVE TO BE TOTALLED UP. WE GET A MIDWEEK BREAK ON WEDNESDAY WHEN THE POST OFFICE IS OFFICALLY CLOSED AT 12:30 IT ALSO CLOSES AT 12:30 ON SATURDAYS.
